hero.title: <web-developer>
hero.text:
I am a programmer with a passion for web development and various programming challenges.

Always on the lookout for new technologies, I am dedicated to enhancing my skills and continually striving for mastery on my journey.

list.title: Greek Geek
list.text: An app to inspire users to do pushups anywhere and track their progress from their phone.
list.description:
This app is designed to inspire users to do pushups anywhere.

Users can set daily goals and track their progress throughout the day. Additionally, they can add friends and create arenas (groups) to compete for the highest number of pushups in a day. The app also provides a detailed pushup history and monthly status overview.

To access these features, users are required to log in or register, ensuring personalized tracking and motivation for achieving fitness goals.

list.title: Food order app
list.text: A front-end app where you can order food online. For mobile only.
list.description:
This front-end project involved implementing an infinite scroll feature for a movie listing. 

I was provided with a design and aimed to replicate it with pixel-perfect accuracy.

As a small project, it highlights my ability to faithfully translate design specifications into a working web interface.

list.title: Portfolio page
list.text: My portfolio page you are currently viewing.
list.description:
This is the current website you are viewing. 

It was conceptualized with custom designs crafted in Figma and brought to life using Vue.js 3 and SCSS. 

The site is hosted on Firebase, showcasing my skill in front-end development and responsive design implementation.

list.title: Cinema scroll
list.text: A front-end project where I implement infinite scroll for movies.
list.description:
A front-end project where I implement infinite scroll for movies. 

This was a project where I was given a design and did to pixel perfect perfection.

list.title: Hudlajf website
list.text: A website made for a company where I did my internship.
list.description:
This project was completed during my tenure at my first company, where I closely collaborated with the designer, marketing team, and tech leader to create a webpage.

I utilized Nuxt2 to develop the site, ensuring seamless integration of design and functionality.

This experience allowed me to refine my skills in teamwork, frontend development, and project coordination, demonstrating my ability to contribute effectively in a collaborative environment.

list.title: Gabi tvoja lepotilnica
list.text: A website for a nails saloon, I am making for a friend.
list.description:
This website project is for a friend's nail salon.

I took the client's requests and translated them into a detailed design using Figma.

Now, I am in the final stages of coding the website with Nuxt2 and styling it with SASS.

This project demonstrates my ability to understand client needs, create visually appealing designs, and implement them using modern web development frameworks.

list.title: Bucket storage
list.text: A front-end project with mock json server and use of bootstrap.
list.description:
This front-end project, built with Angular and styled using Bootstrap CSS, uses a mock JSON server for HTTP calls. 

Users can create and delete buckets and add files to them. This project demonstrates my skills in dynamic data handling and building interactive web applications.

list.title: Panna cakes
list.text: A Next.js (React) website for a cake business, featuring an option to send emails.
list.description:
This project is a website developed using Next.js (React) for a friend's cake baking business.

The website features a convenient email-based system for customers to submit cake requests, improving communication and order management.

Implemented with React for interactive features, Bootstrap for responsive design, and Sass for styling, this project serves as a practical learning experience in Next.js and React development.
